\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 79858}

\subsection*{Meh. A Thousand Times, Meh.}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Nope}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1 cig. & smoked & Leonotis leonurus & plant material\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 150.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Due to participation in an upcoming antidepressant trial, I have had to give up my daily marijuana habit, at least temporarily. No real withdrawal symptoms or cravings, but I've noticed I'm turning back into the same irritable, cynical stick-in-the-mud I was the last time I took a few months' break. Perhaps the mystery pharmaceutical will cure me of this, until then, why not try to self-medicate with something they won't test for? So I rolled a joint of this `wild dagga,' a free sample I had laying around, and\ldots 



Wow!



This is *exactly* like smoking pot, except for two minor details:



-It tastes like rancid goat ass



-It doesn't get me high.

\end{document}
